name: Gameboy Advance Video Banjo Kazooie Series and Conker Bad Fur Day Commercial Compilations
name_original: Gameboy Advance Video Banjo Kazooie Series and Conker Bad Fur Day Commercial Compilations
description:
WOOOOOHEEEEEE!

A Small Compilation of classic RareWare N64 games stars Banjo Kazooie series  until Nuts and Bolts followed by Conker bad fur day commercials extravaganza both american and japanese version ! 

If you like those gameboy advance video,be sure to check my other projects i just cook,like,follow and share with your friends!
